Berkeley Fluids Seminar

University of California, Berkeley

Bring your lunch and enjoy learning about fluids!

Information

What: Fluids

When: Mondays, 12 noon

Where: 3110, Etcheverry Hall

15:00-16:00, HP Auditorium, Soda Hall

Fanuc Room, Etcheverry Hall

Suraj Shankar (Syracuse University/KITP)

3110, Etcheverry Hall

3110, Etcheverry Hall

Beyond the rigid lid: baroclinic modes in a structured atmosphere



Monday, October 23, 2017

3110, Etcheverry Hall

3110, Etcheverry Hall

Friday, November 17, 2017

9 Lewis Hall, 14:00-15:30
